column1: '''Shooting at the Wand''' was a game popular in [[the Shire]] which [[Bilbo Baggins]] played and at which he was quite proficient.<ref>{{H|Flies}}</ref>  The game consisted of using a narrow slat as a target for archery.<ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]; [[Douglas A. Anderson]] (ed.)
column2: (2002) ''[[The Annotated Hobbit: Revised and Expanded Edition]]''
